tns:patch.author: eperez
tns:patch.description: In Activity form's organizations step, set the value of Responsible Organization Group to Government

script.lang: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_g_settings_default_org_group AS SELECT amp_org_group.amp_org_grp_id as id, amp_org_group.org_grp_name as value FROM amp_org_group union select -1 as id, 'None' as value order by id; insert into amp_global_settings(id, settingsName,settingsValue,possibleValues, description,section) values(nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Responsible Organization Default Organization Group','-1','v_g_settings_default_org_group','In Activity form''s organizations step, set the default value of Responsible Organization Group','general');
